title: Harry Potter
short_plot_summary: Young wizard Harry Potter discovers his magical heritage, attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, and battles the dark wizard Voldemort while making lifelong friends.
explanation: A lightning bolt, representing the scar on Harry's forehead which is a symbol of his connection with the dark wizard Voldemort
A mage, symbolizing the magical world and the wizards and witches in the Harry Potter series
A stack of books, representing Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where students learn magic
A crystal ball, illustrating the various magical artifacts and elements present in the story
A castle, signifying the Hogwarts castle where most of the series takes place
